title: Sleepless Night
detail_text: <:th_ch0106/>Kukkukku… The day when Yohane will rule the world is finally upon us... My little demons, be prepared!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0103/>Yoshiko-chan, you’re really excited about this month’s event, huh?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0106/>It’s Yohane! And I’m more than just excited. It’s more like… I can feel the dark power bubbling up from the abysses!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0107/>So you’re really looking forward to it, zura.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0106/>Ugh! Don’t just sum it up in one sentence!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0101/>Yeah, yeah, I totally get it! Totally!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0106/>That’s the face of someone who doesn’t understand at all...<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0101/>But we get to meet everyone who’s always supporting us, right? It keeps me up at night, wondering what we’ll talk about, or what Numazu souvenirs to give!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0109/>It does!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0104/>Ruby, lack of sleep isn’t good for you.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0105/>But when you’re excited about something, sometimes you just can’t sleep!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0102/>I was wondering why the lights were still on in Chika-chan’s room so late. So that’s what it was...<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0103/>Chika does have that tendency.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0101/>Eh? I’m not the only one, right? Everyone has times like that, don’t they?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0108/>I can’t deny that. But...<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0109/>But?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0108/>There’s a method to ensure a good night’s sleep. 𝅘𝅥𝅮<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0106/>That wouldn’t work for Yohane. After all, the night is when Yohane’s powers are at their peak...<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0103/>Oh, I see. I get it!!!!!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0106/>Let me finish speaking, will you? But what did you understand just now?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0107/>I have a bad feeling about this, zura...<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0104/>I think I know what you’re about to say...<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0109/>...Big sis?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0103/>If we push ourselves to the limit, we’re bound to sleep soundly at night!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0105/>That’s true.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0101/>You-chan!? That’s not true! Wait, wait, Kanan-chan’s special training is...<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0103/>Don’t worry, don’t worry! I’ll go easy on you.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0107/>No way, zura~~~~!!!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
